description: Sweet pumpkin mash is the perfect match for veal chops and sage, but you can also use butternut squash.
name: Veal Chops with Sage & Pumpkin Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Place the pumpkin and garlic in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 10 minutes, until tender. Drain well and leave in the pan, covered.

Heat the butter and oil in a large, ovenproof pan on medium high heat, top each chop with sage leaves and cook for 2 minutes on each side. Place the pan into the oven and cook for 5 minutes. Leave to rest for 5 minutes covered in foil.
Mash the pumpkin with a handheld blender, stir in the creme fraiche and parmesan and serve with the veal chops.
